original_text: He built up the fortified cities of Judah, since the land was at peace. No one was at war with him during those years, for the Lord gave him rest.
korean_text: 여호와께서 아사에게 평안을 주셨으므로 그 땅이 평안하여 여러 해 싸움이 없은지라 그가 견고한 성읍들을 유다에 건축하니라

sentences.original_text: He built up the fortified cities of Judah
since the land was at peace
No one was at war with him
for the Lord gave him rest
